item.title: What Are AI Agents?
item.description: AI agents are more than fancy chatbots they're autonomous systems that can reason, plan, and take action. Here's what makes them different and why they matter.

item.title: Context Engineering: The Next Evolution in AI Development
item.description: Context is a critical but finite resource for AI agents. As we move from simple prompts to complex agentic systems, mastering context engineering becomes essential for building reliable, effective AI applications.
